1.0.name: wordpress/birdmagazine
1.0.description: BirdMAGAZINE is a flexible two-column blog theme. Features the grid layout by  a jQuery Masonry. and uses CSS3 media queries for its responsive layout and is therefore optimized for tablet pcs and smart phones. Features include the Theme Customize. You can choose the text color, link color, header line and footer background color and navigation color.
